ai.summary: Carn Brea FP 36 is a very short, easy walk in the UK on a public footpath near Carn Brea. At about 0.3 km, it’s ideal for beginners or anyone seeking a quick outdoor stretch.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly level public footpath with some uneven stones and possible damp patches after rain. Short distance but footing may vary; suitable for beginners with basic care.
ai.safety_notes: Despite the short distance, wear sturdy footwear and check the forecast. Surfaces can be uneven or slippery when wet. Stay on marked paths, supervise children, and bring a light if visiting in low light conditions.
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with the best conditions typically in late spring to early autumn. Winter visits require extra caution due to damp surfaces and shorter daylight hours.

seo.title: Carn Brea FP 36 – Short Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Carn Brea FP 36, a 0.3 km easy hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners seeking a quick outdoor walk with basic safety tips and gear.
